name: Blobs of the Jungle
description:
Save the blobs from the deadly infection in the Jungle! Defeat the main source to win the game. Reload ammo and replenish health in the safety zone. Don't forget, the enemies will keep spawning while you're gone! Play full screen for best experience!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Right-Click - Pick up neutral blobs (blue) while you are on top of them, Reload ammo, Replenish Health

Left-Click - Shoot infected enemies

Web version and updates coming soon!
